6 | Association football | 2015 UEFA Champions League Final | Continental | Barcelona
6 | Horse racing | 2015 Epsom Derby | Domestic | Horse : Golden Horn Jockey : Frankie Dettori Trainer : John Gosden

6-11 | Fencing | 2015 European Fencing Championships | Continental | Italy , Russia , and France ( 3 gold medals ) Overall : Italy

7 | Formula One | 2015 Canadian Grand Prix | International | Lewis Hamilton ( Mercedes )
7-14 | Amateur boxing | 2015 ASBC Asian Confederation Junior Boxing Championships | Continental | Uzbekistan
8-10 | Baseball | 2015 Major League Baseball Draft | Domestic | # 1 pick : Dansby Swanson ( to the Arizona Diamondbacks from Vanderbilt )
8-14 | Archery | 2015 World Archery Youth Championships | International | South Korea
9-14 | Water polo | 2015 FINA Women 's Water Polo World League | International | United States
11 | Athletics | Bislett Games | International | Kenya
11-14 | Golf | Senior Players Championship | International | Bernhard Langer

wiki_section_title: Calendar by month -- June

wiki_section_text: 

intro: 2015 in sports describes the year's events in world sport. This year, some sporting events listed below are qualifying ones, for athletes, to compete at the 2016 Summer Olympics and Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro. From July 2015 to May 2016, the venues for the 2016 Summer Olympics and Paralympics will be tested, by hosting various events in them.

qa.question: What year was the winner of the the Investec Derby in 2015 foaled ?

triviaqa_23697_16.Query Analysis: The query seeks the year of birth (foaling year) of the horse that won the Investec Derby in 2015.
triviaqa_23697_16.Answer Analysis: The answer is 2012, indicating the winning horse of the 2015 Investec Derby was born in 2012.
triviaqa_23697_16.Document Content Analysis: The document provides commentary and results of various races associated with the Investec Derby event, including the Investec ‘Dash’ Heritage Handicap, Investec Coronation Cup, and Investec Woodcote Stakes. It also mentions a controversy involving a horse named Epicuris and a tongue-tie issue.
triviaqa_23697_16.Document and Query Keywords Matching: The document mentions 'Investec Derby' but does not directly reference the winner of the 2015 race or any foaling years.
triviaqa_23697_16.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: The document does not contain the year '2012' in relation to any horse or race winner.
triviaqa_23697_16.Key Information Matching: The document is focused on race results and commentary around the Investec Derby event but lacks specific information about the winner of the 2015 race or their foaling year.
triviaqa_23697_16.Can the Document Answer the Query: No, the document does not provide the foaling year of the 2015 Investec Derby winner.
triviaqa_23697_16.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: No, the document does not offer any relevant details that could help infer the foaling year of the 2015 Investec Derby winner.
triviaqa_23697_16.Explanation: The document, while related to the Investec Derby, does not contain any information about the winner of the 2015 race or their foaling year. It is primarily focused on other races and unrelated commentary, making it irrelevant to the specific query.
